newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bimantara unit to launch new projects.
newsitem.headline: Bimantara unit to launch new projects.

text.p: Indonesia's Bimantara subsidiary PT Elektrindo Nusantara said on Tuesday it planned to launch new telecommunications services this year to boost its sales.

"We have some projects to be launched this year including a wireless mobile data-based system and submarine cables," Harry Kuntoro, president director of Elektrindo, told reporters after a conference organised by PT ING Barings Indonesia.
Kuntoro said the wireless mobile data-based system project would be carried out in cooperation with Motorola of the United States in May with investments totalling $20 million.
He said the submarine cable project was expected to begin in April with an investment of $10 million.
Kuntoro said other projects to be launched soon included very a small aperture terminal (V-Sat) which will be developed jointly with NEC of Japan.
